entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
